    public class ShortcutBeanContainer<IDTYPE,BEANTYPE>
extends com.vaadin.data.util.BeanContainer<IDTYPE,BEANTYPE>
implements IShortcutBeanContainer
    An extension of the BeanContainer, which adds shorcuts properties.
    Since:
    0.2.0
    Author:
    Vincent Demeester
